paragraphs.text:
%sh
wget -c http://archive.ics.uci.edu/ml/machine-learning-databases/00222/bank.zip
hdfs dfs -mkdir /tmp
unzip bank.zip
hdfs dfs -put bank.csv /tmp

msg.data:
Found 2 items
-rw-r--r--   1 root root     461474 2020-06-27 02:53 /tmp/bank.csv
drwxr-xr-x   - root root       4096 2020-06-27 02:54 /tmp/hsperfdata_root
bankText: org.apache.spark.rdd.RDD[String] = bank-full.csv MapPartitionsRDD[6] at textFile at <console>:27

paragraphs.text: case class Bank(age:Integer, job:String, marital : String, education : String, balance : Integer)

val bank = bankText.map(s=>s.split(";")).filter(x=>x(0)!="\"age\"").map(
    s=>Bank(s(0).toInt, 
            s(1).replaceAll("\"", ""),
            s(2).replaceAll("\"", ""),
            s(3).replaceAll("\"", ""),
            s(5).replaceAll("\"", "").toInt
        )
)

paragraphs.text:
%sql
select marital,sum(balance) bal from bank group by marital
